thread.title: TV special to honor Mickey Mouse, other animated stars
thread.title_full: TV special to honor Mickey Mouse, other animated stars

title: TV special to honor Mickey Mouse, other animated stars
text: > Entertainment TV special to honor Mickey Mouse, other animated stars In this photo provided by FOX, Marge, right, promises to make Halloween fun for Bart, left, in the all-new "Halloween Horror‚Äù episode of "The Simpsons," that aired Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015, (8:00-8:30 PM ET/PT) on FOX. Mickey Mouse, Bart Simpson and Scooby-Doo will share the limelight in a TV special paying tribute to cartoon characters. FOX said Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015, it will air a two-hour program, "TV's Funniest Animated Stars: A Paley Center for Media Special," honoring 40 animated stars that have touched fans with humor and even proven influential. (FOX via AP)
